## function_createTransition
> **createTransition**(`config`?): [`TransitionWidget`](#transitionwidget)

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:225](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L225)

Create a transition widget.

The widget will include a patch function, stores to track the animation states and a directive to apply the animation to an element.

### Parameters

#### config?

[`PropsConfig`](../../types#propsconfig)\<[`TransitionProps`](#transitionprops)\>

the props config of the transition

### Returns

[`TransitionWidget`](#transitionwidget)

the transition widget

## function_noAnimation
> **noAnimation**(`element`, `direction`, `animated`, `signal`, `context`): `void` \| [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:191](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L191)

A transition to show / hide an element without any animated. It uses the HTML `display` attribute.

### Parameters

#### element

[`SSRHTMLElement`](../../types#ssrhtmlelement)

the element to animate

#### direction

the direction

`"show"` | `"hide"`

#### animated

`boolean`

Whether the transition should be animated.

#### signal

[`AbortSignal`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/AbortSignal)

Signal allowing to stop the transition while running.

#### context

`object`

Context of the current transition. It is reused between calls if the previous transition was stopped while running on the same element.

### Returns

`void` \| [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

## interface_TransitionApi
Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:130](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L130)

Interface representing the API for managing transitions of an element.

### Properties

#### hide

> **hide**: (`animated`?) => [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:149](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L149)

Runs the transition to hide the element. It is equivalent to [toggle](#transitionapi-toggle) with false as the first parameter.

##### Parameters

###### animated?

`boolean`

whether the transition should be animated. If the parameter is not defined, the [animated](#transitionprops-animated) property is used.

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

A promise that is fulfilled when the transition is completed. If the transition is canceled, or if the same transition was
already running, the promise never completes.

***

#### show

> **show**: (`animated`?) => [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:139](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L139)

Runs the transition to show the element. It is equivalent to [toggle](#transitionapi-toggle) with true as the first parameter.

##### Parameters

###### animated?

`boolean`

whether the transition should be animated. If the parameter is not defined, the [animated](#transitionprops-animated) property is used.

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

A promise that is fulfilled when the transition is completed. If the transition is canceled, or if the same transition was
already running, the promise never completes.

***

#### toggle

> **toggle**: (`visible`?, `animated`?) => [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:160](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L160)

Runs the transition to show or hide the element depending on the first parameter.

##### Parameters

###### visible?

`boolean`

whether the element should be made visible or not. If the parameter is not defined, the opposite of the current [visible](#transitionprops-visible-2) property is used.

###### animated?

`boolean`

whether the transition should be animated. If the parameter is not defined, the [animated](#transitionprops-animated) property is used.

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

A promise that is fulfilled when the transition is completed. If the transition is canceled, or if the same transition was
already running, the promise never completes.

the transition directive

## type alias_TransitionFn
> **TransitionFn**: (`element`, `direction`, `animated`, `signal`, `context`) => [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\> \| `void`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:12](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L12)

#### direction

`"show"` | `"hide"`

#### animated

#### signal

[`AbortSignal`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/AbortSignal)

#### context

### Returns

## interface_TransitionProps
Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:42](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L42)

Properties for configuring a transition.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:56](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L56)

Whether the transition should be animated.

***

#### animatedOnInit

> **animatedOnInit**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:61](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L61)

If the element is initially visible, whether the element should be animated when first displayed.

***

#### initDone

> **initDone**: `null` \| `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:72](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L72)

Whether initialization is finished. It determines which setting between [TransitionProps.animated](#transitionprops-animated)
and [TransitionProps.animatedOnInit](#transitionprops-animatedoninit) is used to enable or disable animations.

##### Remarks

If it is `true`, initialization is considered finished, and [TransitionProps.animatedOnInit](#transitionprops-animatedoninit) is no longer used.
Otherwise, initialization is considered unfinished and [TransitionProps.animatedOnInit](#transitionprops-animatedoninit) is used instead of [TransitionProps.animated](#transitionprops-animated).
If it is `null`, it will be set to `true` automatically when the directive is called with a DOM element.
If it is `false`, it will not be updated automatically.

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:82](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L82)

Function to be called when the transition is completed and the element is not visible.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:77](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L77)

Function to be called when the transition is completed and the element is visible.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:89](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L89)

Function to be called when the visible property changes.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

new value of the visible property

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### transition

> **transition**: [`TransitionFn`](#transitionfn)

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:46](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L46)

Transition to be called.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:51](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L51)

Whether the element should be visible when the transition is completed.

## interface_TransitionState
Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:95](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L95)

Transition state.

### Properties

#### element

> **element**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:109](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L109)

Reference to the DOM element.

***

#### elementPresent

> **elementPresent**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:104](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L104)

Whether the element to be animated is present in the DOM.

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:124](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L124)

Equals: ! [visible](#transitionstate-visible) && ! [transitioning](#transitionstate-transitioning)

***

#### shown

> **shown**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:119](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L119)

Equals: [visible](#transitionstate-visible) && ! [transitioning](#transitionstate-transitioning)

***

#### transitioning

> **transitioning**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:114](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L114)

Whether a transition is currently running.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:99](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L99)

Whether the element is visible or will be visible when the transition is completed.

## type alias_TransitionWidget
> **TransitionWidget**: [`Widget`](../../types#widget)\<[`TransitionProps`](#transitionprops), [`TransitionState`](#transitionstate), [`TransitionApi`](#transitionapi), [`TransitionDirectives`](#transitiondirectives)\>

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts:181](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/baseTransitions.ts#L181)

Represents a widget that handles transitions.

### Template

The properties required for the transition.

### Template

The state management for the transition.

### Template

The API interface for the transition.

### Template

The directives used in the transition.
